software_stack.tipHTML: Reference to an image to use to start the session container
software_stack.title: Software Stack

session_name.tipHTML: Name for the session. Alphanumeric characters.
session_name.title: Session Name

context_memory.tipHTML: System memory (RAM) to be used for the session. Default: 16G
context_memory.title: Memory

context_cores.tipHTML: Number of cores used by the session. Default: 2
context_cores.title: # of Cores
